subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ 3-0 loss to the Washington Nationals Thursday night, in the second game of a doubleheader, guaranteed that they would end with a losing record for the sixth straight season.
snippet: The Mets’ 3-0 loss to the Washington Nationals Thursday night, in the second game of a doubleheader, guaranteed that they would end with a losing record for the sixth straight season.
